Trigger You would take damage from a Strike made by a creature.

As you are struck, your steely determination reminds those who fight you that they are destined to be no more than footnotes in your tale. Spend a Mythic Point to gain resistance equal to half your level to the triggering damage, and then attempt a Strike at mythic proficiency against the creature that attacked you. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1}.
